5369.quoteText:
We use the following types of cookies:

(a) Strictly necessary cookies. These are cookies that are required for the operation of our website.
5369.title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

5370.quoteText: We may use third-party analytics tools such as Google Analytics, to help us measure traffic and usage trends for the Online Services and to understand more about the demographics of our users.
5370.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

5371.quoteText: You can learn more about Googleâ€™s practices at http://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners, and view its currently available opt-out options at https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.
5371.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

5372.quoteText: Please be aware that advertisers and other third parties may use their own cookies tags when you click on an advertisement or link on our website. These third parties are responsible for setting out their own cookie and privacy policies.
5372.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

5373.quoteText:
We also use clear gifs in HTML-based emails sent to our Customers to track which emails are opened and which links are clicked by recipients.
The information allows for more accurate reporting and improvement of our Service.
5373.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

5374.quoteText: We are unable to respond to Do Not Track signals set by your browser at this time.
5374.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

5375.quoteText:
From time to time, we may receive information about you from third parties and other users:

Information obtained from third parties. We may obtain information from third parties to enhance or supplement our existing user information. We may also collect information about you that is publicly available. We may combine this information with the information we collect from you directly.
5375.title: Your profile is combined across various products

tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products

5384.quoteText: For all other categories of personal data, we will store it for no longer than necessary for the purposes set out above and in accordance with our legal obligations and legitimate business interests.
5384.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

5386.quoteText: You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for restricting access to your account.
5386.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

9734.quoteText: Drop is under no obligation to review any content (including any messages) posted on or sent through the Site by users and assumes no responsibility or liability relating to any such content. Drop, in its sole discretion, may monitor, not post or remove any such content.
9734.title: The service can read your private messages

tosdr.case: The service can read your private messages
